allproducts.name: Samsung Odyssey G3 Gaming Monitor
allproducts.productDetails: 27” FHD, 144Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time for seamless gaming.

reviews.description: Absolutely love the smoothness and color accuracy!
Very good monitor but stand height is a bit low.
Great value for money—no dead pixels and very crisp visuals.
Good monitor but wish the menu settings were more intuitive.
Perfect for competitive gaming, zero ghosting even at 144Hz!
Colors are vibrant. Stand is a bit wobbly though.
Absolutely stunning curve—so immersive in racing games!
Overall solid monitor, but wish it had USB-C input.
Crystal clear at every angle—no washed‑out colors.
Very responsive but the OSD brightness setting is limited.

allproducts.name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max
allproducts.productDetails: 6.7” ProMotion OLED display, A16 Bionic chip, triple‑camera system.

reviews.description: Incredible camera quality and super smooth performance.
Love the speed, but wish battery lasted longer under heavy use.

allproducts.name: Acer KA270 G 27.5 Curved Monitor
allproducts.productDetails: Curved VA panel, WQHD resolution, 165Hz refresh for ultra-smooth visuals.

reviews.description: Stunning curve and color depth—highly immersive!
Very good but stand wobble sometimes.

allproducts.name: AirPods Pro
allproducts.productDetails: Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, up to 24h battery life.

reviews.description: Fantastic noise cancellation and very comfortable fit!
Great sound but battery life drops after extensive use.

allproducts.name: Boult Audio W20
allproducts.productDetails: Bluetooth 5.0, immersive bass, sweat & splash resistant design.

reviews.description: Very punchy bass and secure fit for workouts.
Sound is good but the touch controls can be finicky.

allproducts.name: BoAt Airdopes Ace Wireless
allproducts.productDetails: Ultra-comfort fit, touch controls, up to 25h playtime with case.

reviews.description: Extremely comfy and the battery lasts forever!
Good value, but bass could be deeper.

allproducts.name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro
allproducts.productDetails: 6.1” Super Retina XDR display, A18 chip, advanced camera system.

reviews.description: Stunning display and blazing-fast performance!
Great camera, but I miss the headphone jack.

allproducts.name: ThinkPad E16 Gen 2
allproducts.productDetails: 16” FHD, Intel Core i7, robust build with spill-resistant keyboard.

reviews.description: Solid build quality and very reliable for work.
Great keyboard and performance, though it's a bit heavy.

allproducts.name: Garmin Venu 3 Smartwatch
allproducts.productDetails: AMOLED display, advanced health metrics, up to 10 days battery life.

reviews.description: Battery easily lasts 9 days, and health stats are very accurate.
Great display clarity, though I wish the UI was a bit snappier.

allproducts.name: OnePlus 12 Pro 5G
allproducts.productDetails: 6.7” Fluid AMOLED, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 120W fast charging.

reviews.description: Fluid display and lightning-fast charging are game changers!
Excellent performance; camera is good but not class‑leading.

allproducts.name: Samsung QN90C Neo QLED TV
allproducts.productDetails: 55” 4K UHD, Quantum HDR, Quantum Matrix Technology Pro.

reviews.description: Picture quality is breathtaking and blacks are truly deep.
Excellent brightness but remote control feels cheap.

allproducts.name: Logitech G915 TKL Wireless Keyboard
allproducts.productDetails: Low-profile GL switches, LIGHTSPEED wireless, RGB per-key lighting.

reviews.description: Ultra‑low profile switches feel amazing for typing.
Great build and battery life, but keycaps can be slippery.

allproducts.name: Sony Alpha a7 IV Mirrorless Camera
allproducts.productDetails: 33MP full-frame sensor, 4K/60p video, 10‑bit recording, in-body stabilization.

reviews.description: Image quality is superb and video modes are versatile.
Fantastic autofocus but a bit heavy for handheld use.

allproducts.name: Apple iPad Air (5th Gen)
allproducts.productDetails: 10.9” Liquid Retina, M1 chip, Touch ID, USB‑C, Apple Pencil support.

reviews.description: M1 performance is incredible—apps run so smoothly, and display is gorgeous!
Lightweight and powerful, though I wish the stereo speakers were louder.

allproducts.name: JBL Charge 5 Waterproof Speaker
allproducts.productDetails: 20 W output, 20h playtime, IP67 waterproof, USB‑C charging.

reviews.description: Amazing bass and lasts all day at moderate volume. Perfect for outdoors!
Great clarity, but charging port cover feels flimsy over time.

allproducts.name: Razer DeathAdder V2 Gaming Mouse
allproducts.productDetails: 8,500 DPI optical sensor, 69 g lightweight frame, Speedflex cable.

reviews.description: Superb ergonomics and ultra-responsive clicks—ideal for long sessions.
Lightweight and precise, though cable can get a bit stiff over time.
